data.actual_result: the first emote is normal but the second emote shows up as the 1st emotes followed by numbers (most likely an ID) inside triangular brackets
data.expected_result: the emotes work as normal and are shown as expected in chat
data.short_description: when sending 2 emotes with a duplicate name but are seperate emotes (i.e "donkey" and "donkey-1" the first emote is normal but the second emote shows up as the 1st emote followed by numbers (most likely an ID) inside triangular brackets
data.steps_to_repro: - make sure you have 2 emotes with a duplicate name (the other one should/will have a -1 at the end) and type both of them into that - send what you have typed - observe
